title: Bloc vs Provider: Choosing the Right State Management
abstract: Which state management approach should you use in Flutter? We compare Bloc and Provider for different use cases.

title: How to Optimize Flutter App Performance
abstract: Tips and techniques to improve rendering speed, reduce jank, and use memory efficiently in Flutter.

title: Building a Custom Flutter Widget from Scratch
abstract: Learn how to create your own reusable custom widgets in Flutter and when to do so.
